function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on ventilation in nonmedical settings","Impact":"Increased risk of SARS-CoV-2 transmission in nonmedical environments","Mitigation":"Conduct studies and implement best practices for utilizing building ventilation in nonmedical settings","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Workers, community members, students, residents","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of the importance of ventilation","Impact":"Higher likelihood of COVID-19 transmission among individuals in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns about the role of ventilation in reducing disease transmission","Technologies":"Communication technologies for spreading awareness","People":"General public, building occupants","Owner":"Public health agencies, educational institutions, businesses"},{"Description":"Reliance on lower cost natural ventilation","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness in reducing the risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Investment in mechanical ventilation systems for enhanced air movement and filtration","Technologies":"Advanced mechanical ventilation systems, air quality monitoring devices","People":"Building owners, facility managers, homeowners","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, homeowners"}]}
